---
title: "Penguin Ski Dash Game"
format: html
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(knitr)
```

```{r load-data, echo=FALSE}
# Load the JSON data
game_data <- fromJSON("game-data.json")
```

## `r game_data$game$title`

**Description:** `r game_data$game$description`

### Game Information
- **Version:** `r game_data$game$version`
- **Genre:** `r game_data$game$genre`
- **Platform:** `r game_data$game$platform`

### Controls
```{r controls, echo=FALSE}
controls_df <- data.frame(
  Action = c("Move Left", "Move Right", "Start Game"),
  Key = c(game_data$game$controls$left, game_data$game$controls$right, game_data$game$controls$start)
)
kable(controls_df)
```

### Features
```{r features, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
for(feature in game_data$game$features) {
  cat("- ", feature, "\n")
}
```

### Game Canvas
- **Width:** `r game_data$game$canvas$width`px
- **Height:** `r game_data$game$canvas$height`px

### Raw JSON Data
```{r json-display, echo=FALSE}
# Display the raw JSON in a formatted way
cat("```json\n")
cat(toJSON(game_data, pretty = TRUE))
cat("\n```")
```
